SYN_BRONCH_1_7:
[Indication]
Airway stent occlusion in setting of malignant central airway obstruction.

[Anesthesia]
General Anesthesia via LMA.

[Description]
Therapeutic scope passed. Silicone Y-stent and RMS covered stent id[REDACTED]. Significant obstruction via inspissated mucus plugs. Mechanical and forceps debulking performed along with sodium bicarbonate lavage until stents recanalized. LUL anterior segment tumor noted (40%). Diagnostic BAL performed in LUL anterior segment.

[Plan]
Transfer to PACU. Discharge when stable.
